Flow.description: Notifications in team doc and forecasting doc when Opportunities are updated or closed

value.stringValue:
" PUSH Alert
Push from Q4 -> Q1"& "
Opportunity: " & [Opportunity].Name & "
Opportunity Amount: " & TEXT( [Opportunity].Amount) & "
Previous Close Date: " &TEXT(PRIORVALUE([Opportunity].CloseDate)) & "
New Close Date: " &TEXT([Opportunity].CloseDate) & "
AE: " & [Opportunity].Owner.FirstName & " " & [Opportunity].Owner.LastName

formulas.name: formula_3_myRule_1_A2_1419955168
formulas.expression:
" PUSH Alert
Push from Q4 -> Q1"& "
Opportunity: " & {!myVariable_current.Name} & "
Opportunity Amount: " & TEXT( {!myVariable_current.Amount}) & "
Previous Close Date: " &TEXT(PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.CloseDate})) & "
New Close Date: " &TEXT({!myVariable_current.CloseDate}) & "
AE: " & {!myVariable_current.Owner.FirstName} & " " & {!myVariable_current.Owner.LastName}

value.stringValue:
" PUSH Alert
Push from Q4 -> Q1"& "
Opportunity: " & [Opportunity].Name & "
Opportunity Amount: " & TEXT( [Opportunity].Amount) & "
Previous Close Date: " &TEXT(PRIORVALUE([Opportunity].CloseDate)) & "
New Close Date: " &TEXT([Opportunity].CloseDate) & "
AE: " & [Opportunity].Owner.FirstName & " " & [Opportunity].Owner.LastName & "
Segment: " & TEXT([Opportunity].Segment__c )

formulas.name: formula_4_myRule_1_A1_6168832436
formulas.expression:
" PUSH Alert
Push from Q4 -> Q1"& "
Opportunity: " & {!myVariable_current.Name} & "

New Close Date: " &TEXT({!myVariable_current.CloseDate}) & "
AE: " & {!myVariable_current.Owner.FirstName} & " " & {!myVariable_current.Owner.LastName} & "
Segment: " & TEXT({!myVariable_current.00N3m00000FQeE8__NotFound} )

value.stringValue:

New Close Date: " &TEXT([Opportunity].CloseDate) & "
